# Seconds in a Day

> Number of seconds in a day.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var SECONDS_IN_DAY = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/seconds-in-day' );
```

#### SECONDS_IN_DAY

Number of seconds in a day.

``` javascript
SECONDS_IN_DAY === 86400;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SECONDS_IN_DAY = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/seconds-in-day' );

console.log( SECONDS_IN_DAY );
// => 86400
```
